    \index{hal \textit{(package)}!hal.internet \textit{(package)}!hal.internet.youtube \textit{(module)}|(}
\section{Module hal.internet.youtube}

    \label{hal:internet:youtube}
\begin{alltt}
Get rss feed for youtube channel. 
\end{alltt}


%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
%%                               Functions                               %%
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%

  \subsection{Functions}

    \label{hal:internet:youtube:get_channel_page}
    \index{hal \textit{(package)}!hal.internet \textit{(package)}!hal.internet.youtube \textit{(module)}!hal.internet.youtube.get\_channel\_page \textit{(function)}}

    \vspace{0.5ex}

\hspace{.8\funcindent}\begin{boxedminipage}{\funcwidth}

    \raggedright \textbf{get\_channel\_page}(\textit{channel\_name}, \textit{youtube\_channel\_url}={\tt "https://www.youtube.com/user/"})

    \vspace{-1.5ex}

    \rule{\textwidth}{0.5\fboxrule}
\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
\begin{alltt}

:param channel\_name: string
    name of channel (e.g in "https://www.youtube.com/user/caseyneistat" you should take "caseyneistat")
:param youtube\_channel\_url: string
    base url of youtube channels.
@return string
    source page of youtube channel.
\end{alltt}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
    \end{boxedminipage}

    \label{hal:internet:youtube:get_channel_id}
    \index{hal \textit{(package)}!hal.internet \textit{(package)}!hal.internet.youtube \textit{(module)}!hal.internet.youtube.get\_channel\_id \textit{(function)}}

    \vspace{0.5ex}

\hspace{.8\funcindent}\begin{boxedminipage}{\funcwidth}

    \raggedright \textbf{get\_channel\_id}(\textit{channel\_name}, \textit{channel\_id\_field}={\tt "data-channel-external-id"})

    \vspace{-1.5ex}

    \rule{\textwidth}{0.5\fboxrule}
\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
\begin{alltt}

:param channel\_name: string
    name of channel (e.g in "https://www.youtube.com/user/caseyneistat" you should take "caseyneistat")
:param channel\_id\_field: string
    default field to get channel id
:return string
    id of youtube channel
\end{alltt}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
    \end{boxedminipage}

    \label{hal:internet:youtube:get_channel_feed_url}
    \index{hal \textit{(package)}!hal.internet \textit{(package)}!hal.internet.youtube \textit{(module)}!hal.internet.youtube.get\_channel\_feed\_url \textit{(function)}}

    \vspace{0.5ex}

\hspace{.8\funcindent}\begin{boxedminipage}{\funcwidth}

    \raggedright \textbf{get\_channel\_feed\_url}(\textit{channel\_name}, \textit{base\_feed\_url}={\tt "https://www.youtube.com/feeds/videos.xml?channel\_id="})

    \vspace{-1.5ex}

    \rule{\textwidth}{0.5\fboxrule}
\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
\begin{alltt}

:param channel\_name: string
    name of channel (e.g in "https://www.youtube.com/user/caseyneistat" you should take "caseyneistat")
:param base\_feed\_url: string
    default base url for rss feed of youtube channels.
:return string
    rss url feed of youtube channel.
\end{alltt}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
    \end{boxedminipage}

    \index{hal \textit{(package)}!hal.internet \textit{(package)}!hal.internet.youtube \textit{(module)}|)}
